Text saved: Culture is the way people in a country live, think, and act. A stereotype is a simple idea about a group of people. This idea is often wrong.

It is good to know about different cultures. This helps us talk to people without problems. But we must be careful. Stereotypes are bad for business relationships.

Our country's culture is important. It changes how we act and think. But other things are also important. For example, the part of the country we are from. Our friends and family are important. Our age is important. If we are a man or a woman is important. The company we work for is important. And the things that happen in our life are important.

So, it is good to know that people can be different. But we should not think everyone from a country is the same.
